author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...ERICK RAPIDLY WEAKENS TO A TROPICAL DEPRESSION... ...FLOODING RAINS CONTINUE...
summary: ...ERICK RAPIDLY WEAKENS TO A TROPICAL DEPRESSION... ...FLOODING RAINS CONTINUE... As of 6:00 PM CST Thu Jun 19 the center of Erick was located near 17.7, -100.2 with movement NW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1006 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...ERICK RAPIDLY WEAKENS TO A TROPICAL DEPRESSION... ...FLOODING RAINS CONTINUE... As of 6:00 PM CST Thu Jun 19 the center of Erick was located near 17.7, -100.2 with movement NW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1006 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

title: Summary for Tropical Depression Erick (EP5/EP052025)
